items.text: How often do you have trouble completing the final details of a project -- once the challenging parts are done?
When you have to do a task that requires a lot of organization -- how often do you have a hard time getting everything in order?
How often do you have problems remembering appointments?
When you have something to do that requires a lot of thought -- how often do you delay getting started? Or avoid the task altogether.
How often do you fidget – or squirm with your hands or feet – when you have to sit for a long time?
How often do you feel overly compelled to do things, like you were driven by a motor?
